main event: On 4 September 1956, a civilian observed several star-shaped glowing objects in Parma Heights, Ohio.
interesting points: The objects glowed in various colors including yellow, green, blue, orange, and red., The sighting lasted for 15 minutes but the objects did not move., The observer's 12-year-old son also noticed the objects., The report suggests that the sightings may have been caused by planet Mars., No similar reports were received regarding this matter.
